result.title: Literature review on intangibles and public policies.
result.description: State of the art in policy frameworks. A structured and systematic literature review explores the state of the art when it comes to the role of policy, regulatory and fiscal framework conditions for the generation (supply) and in particular the adoption and use (demand) of intangible assets (ICT, R&D competences, organisational practices). The review will cover academic and evaluation practitioner.

result.title: First Draft Handbook/guide for new measurement/data production
result.description: MICROPRODs experimental approach with the Pilot NSIs will take the form of workshops, which we plan to hold at M3 and M9 at MTA KRTK and IWH. MICROPROD will eventually scale up to further NSIs, and in order to do so, we will be providing a Handbook (i.e. guide) for new measurement/data production.

result.title: Final report on the formulation, evaluation, and prototyping of the advanced methods and tools
result.description: Final report summarising the results of all iterations of tasks dedicated to the formulation validation verification and prototyping of the advanced methods and tools in support of new mobility solutions analysis assessment and monitoring This report will include the schematic representation of the advanced methods and tools the documentation accompanying their associated scripts and will also provide evidence on the interaction with tasks dedicated to the design and development of a consolidated toolkit to fulfil the needs of key stakeholders Finally this report will include metrics and indicators for the effectiveness and accuracy of the advanced methods and tools based on the results of the case studies

result.title: Web-based information system for supervision and management of marshalling yards
result.description: Demonstrator of Web-based information system for supervision and management of marshalling yards. Complex deliverable that includes a database for storing information system data and importing data collected in WP5, marshalling yards visual representation module, the inbound and outbound traffic data input module, module for marshalling process planning, support for integration with railway companies information systems and support for integration with marshalling yards automation systems.

result.title: Publicly available software library for planning a marshalling process using the developed optimization algorithm
result.description: Publicly available library for planning a marshalling process using the developed optimization algorithm. This library will enable its users to model their own marshalling yard as well as inbound and outbound train parameters and perform marshalling process planning using the developed optimization algorithm outside of the information system for supervision and management of marshalling yards.

result.title: Baseline scenario
result.description: Report describing the current baseline scenarios in terms of geo- and temporally referenced water uses and availability, policy framework and demand for water, energy and food in the Omo and Zambezi river basins. Each subtask will contribute, through internal reports corresponding to milestones, an extended chapter under the responsibility of the subtask leader. The last chapter will be a synthesis of the baseline scenarios.

result.title: Report on evaluation of developed SMART technologies
result.description: The report will provide all the results of evaluation of obstacle detection prototype and marshalling yard management software, i.e. the evaluation of all technologies developed in the frame of WP1-6. The deliverable will report on evaluation metrics and procedures, which have been used in the evaluation process. The report will provide results of evaluation of developed technologies in defined Evaluation Scenarios (T7.4-7.5). The report will also provide update on requirements and specification based on research in initial evaluation of developed technologies reported back to development teams.
